data.sentence: The word لَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: To meet or touch or feel a thing with the hand, touch a thing without intervention or interference, strike or smite, afflict or befall, be distressing or difficult of accomplishment.
data.sentence: The word يَمَسُّهُ comes from the root م س س and is associated with the meanings: To meet or touch or feel a thing with the hand, touch a thing without intervention or interference, strike or smite, afflict or befall, be distressing or difficult of accomplishment.

data.meanings: to be or become clean/pure or free of dirt, made it or caused it to be distant/remote, cleanse/wash/purify, refrain, remove oneself, to clear/clean, ablution. Tay-ha/Ha-Ya = spread out, extend/expand.
data.sentence: The word الْمُطَهَّرُونَ comes from the root ط ه ر and is associated with the meanings: to be or become clean/pure or free of dirt, made it or caused it to be distant/remote, cleanse/wash/purify, refrain, remove oneself, to clear/clean, ablution. Tay-ha/Ha-Ya = spread out, extend/expand.
